name: historical-michigan-executive-orders-data
title: Historical Michigan Executive Orders Data
description: Metadata and data derived from Historical Michigan Executive Orders. This is a collection of historical Michigan gubernatorial executive orders from 1955-1999. This static website does not search for subject matter or text inside the documents. It is for quick lookups by users with executive order numbers in hand or who wish to browse by year

contributors.title: Library of Michigan, State Law Library

resources.name: timeline-json
resources.title: Historical Michigan Executive Orders timeline metadata
resources.description: Time-based metadata formatted for TimelineJS or other applications.
